statements: SELECT * FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM bank_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_holder_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC, account_holder_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, transaction_history FROM bank_accounts WHERE transaction_history->>'type' = 'deposit' ORDER BY account_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance > 3000 OR account_holder_name ILIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY account_balance DESC, account_holder_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 1001;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance < 500 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_histories GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_histories WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, AVG(balance) AS avg_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING AVG(balance) > 500;
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances JOIN customer_accounts ON account_balances.account_id = customer_accounts.account_id;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer_accounts JOIN account_balances ON customer_accounts.account_id = account_balances.account_id ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer_accounts JOIN account_balances ON customer_accounts.account_id = account_balances.account_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_histories GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM transaction_histories GROUP BY account_id;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(balance) AS avg_balance FROM customer_accounts JOIN account_balances ON customer_accounts.account_id = account_balances.account_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING AVG(balance) > 5000 ORDER BY avg_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Account;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM Account;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction FROM AccountHistory GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_transaction > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Account ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM Account WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT history_id, account_id, transaction_amount FROM AccountHistory WHERE transaction_amount < 50 ORDER BY history_id ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction FROM Transaction GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_transaction > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Customer LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM Account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT branch_name, branch_location FROM Branch ORDER BY branch_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Account;
SELECT account_number, account_holder_name FROM Account WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance, transaction_amount FROM Account JOIN Transaction ON Account.account_number = Transaction.account_number;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT branch_name, branch_location FROM Branch ORDER BY branch_name DESC;
